21898.「あら まあ 旅人さんでございますわね？\n モ モガレ修道院に ようこそ\n:
Well, well, well. You must be the traveler.
Welcome to Mogare Monastery... ohohohoho...

21899.「あー！ 見ろよ アペペ！\n シスター・ニニカが ネコかぶってるぞ！\n ダッ:
Aah! Look at that, Apepe! Sister Ninika is
acting all innocent! How pathetic!

21900.「なんだい チョッパ！\n シスターしゃべりの 練習してんだ！\n 邪魔するんじ:
Yes, Choppa! Sister, I'm practicing my speech!
Don't interrupt me! Get away from me!

21901.「シスター・ニニカが 怒ったぞー！\n ウヒョー！ チョー コエー！: Sister Ninika is mad! Whoo-hoo! Oh, my God!

21902.「……やれやれ。\n チョッパのせいで お里が 知れちまった。\n アンタの前で:
Oh, dear. Choppa has shown his true colors. I
guess there's no point in playing the cat in
front of you.

21904.「この修道院はね マザー・ヘレナが\n 身寄りのない子供の 面倒を見ている\n:
This convent is also an orphanage where Mother
Helena takes care of children who have no
relatives.

21905.「みんな いろいろ あったけど\n ああやって 元気に 振る舞っていられるのは\:
We've all been through a lot, but it's thanks
to Mother Helena that we're all behaving so
well.

21906.「マザー・ヘレナは 立派な方さ。\n あたいも 孤児でね。昔は 相当 荒れてたけ:
Mother Helena is a fine woman. I was an orphan
myself. I used to have it pretty rough, but
thanks to her, it's a lot better now.

21907.「……で？ 旅人さん。\n アンタ こんな いなかの修道院に\n 何しにきたって:
...And? So, traveler. What brings you to this
whinny monastery?

21908.「……へえ。ドルワーム王立研究院の院長\n ドゥラの使いで マザー・ヘレナにねえ:
Heh. Director Dura of the Royal Institute of
Dolworm sent me to Mother Helena. How could
such an important person...

21909.「……って ちょっと 待った！\n アンタ 今 ドゥラって言ったかい！？\n ド:
Wait a minute! Did you just say Dura? Did you
just say Dura?

21910.「どうした ニニカ？\n ドゥラの名前が 聞こえたが……。\n やつが どうかし:
What's the matter, Ninika? I heard Dura's name
mentioned... what's wrong with him?

21911.<if_woman>「……ああ。\n この ねえちゃん マザー・ヘレナに\n 会:
...oh. This little lady here, I think she's here to see Mother Helena. ...Oh. I think this niece has come to
see Mother Helena.

21912.「あの 裏切り者のドゥラの使いでね……。: You see, he was sent by Dura, the traitor...

21913.「……マザー・ヘレナなら そこの部屋にいる。\n 入るときは ノックを忘れるんじ:
...Mother Helena is in that room. Don't forget
to knock when you come in.

21914.<if_woman>「用件が済んだら さっさと帰ってくれよな。\n あんなやつに:
When you're done with your business, get the hell out of here. I don't want to see a woman's face being pushed around by a guy
like that. When you're done, get the hell out of here. I don't want to see a man's face being pushed around by that guy.

21915.「ようこそ いらっしゃいました。\n 私が マザー・ヘレナでございます。: Welcome, welcome. I am Mother Helena.

21916.「あなたは どうやら ドゥラの使いで\n この修道院まで 来られたようですが……:
It seems that you were sent to this monastery
by Dura. You got the right idea, didn't you?

21917.「私 目が見えない分 耳がよく聞こえましてね。\n 先ほどの あなたと ニニカの:
I am blind, but I can hear well. I listened to
the conversation between you and Ninika
earlier.

21918.「それにしても ドゥラったら\n 私の所へ 使いをよこすなんて……。:
But still, how dare Dura send an
errand to me...

21919.「ドルワームで よほど エラくなったか。\n あるいは…… 育ての親である 私に:
Maybe Dolworm has made him more elusive,
or perhaps... he really didn't want to see
the one who raised him.

21920.「ドゥラは ドルワームに行くまで\n この修道院に 身を置いておりました。\n:
Dura was staying at this monastery until he
went to Dolworm. He was an orphan. I took him
in and...

21921.「ですが ある日……。ドゥラは\n 自分こそが ドルワームの捨てられた王子だと\:
But one day... Dura left, saying he would
prove that he was the abandoned prince of
Dolworm.

21922.「……私は 風のウワサで 耳にしました。\n 本当の双子の王子…… いえ 双子の:
I heard rumors on the wind. I had heard rumors on the wind that the real twin princes, or rather twin princesses, had appeared in
Dolworm.

21923.「あの子ったら 自分の過ちを 気にして\n ここに来られなかったのかしら？\n:
I wonder if she was so worried about her own
mistakes that she couldn't come here? Hmmm.
She's still a child.

21924.「……ところで そのドゥラが 使いまで\n よこして 私に 頼みたかったこととは:
...By the way, what exactly did this Dura want
to ask me to do for him by sending an errand?

21925.「……なるほど。天魔クァバルナという\n 魔物を封じ込めるため そのゼキルの聖杭:
...I see. So you offer Saint's Prayer to that Zekir's Holy Stake in order to contain the monster called Kukulkannibal, the Heavenly
Demon.

21926.「ドゥラのたっての お願いです。\n よろこんで お引き受けしますが\n ひとつ:
This is Dura's request. I will gladly accept,
but there is one problem.

21927.「それほどまで 強大な敵を封じるのであれば\n 神に近い場所…… 聖地にまで 足:
If you want to contain such a powerful enemy,
you must go to a place close to God, to a holy
place, to Say a Prayer.

21928.「そうですね。ウェナ諸島の聖地 清廉の大滝。\n その加護を受けた水の流れる 川:
Right. The Falls of Purityーa sacred
place in the Wena Islands. Near that blessed
water, my prayers will be answered.

21929.「ヴェリナード領北の はるか東にある\n ブーナー熱帯雨林の南東の桟橋から 舟で:
We can take a boat from the southeast pier of
the Booner Rainforest, far east of Verinard
North, and cross over to a pure fountain.

21930.「私は この通り 目が見えませんので\n 耳を頼りに あなたのあとに ついていき:
As you can see, I am blind, so I will follow
you by ear. I'll be counting on you to lead me
there.

21931.「天魔クァバルナを 封じるチカラを\n ゼキルの聖杭に 宿すためには\n 聖地に:
In order to possess the power to seal the
Kukulkannibal, it is necessary to pray at
Zekir's Holy Stake.

21932.「ウェナ諸島にある聖地 清廉の大滝……。\n その加護を受けた水の流れる 川の近:
The Falls of Purity, a sacred place
in the Wena Islands... Near the river with its
blessed waters, my prayers will be answered.

21933.「ヴェリナード領北の はるか東にある\n ブーナー熱帯雨林の南東の桟橋から 舟で:
We can take a boat from the southeast pier of
the Booner Rainforest, far east of Verinard
North, and cross over to a pure fountain.

21934.「私は この通り 目が見えませんので\n 耳を頼りに あなたのあとに ついていき:
As you can see, I am blind, so I will follow
you by ear. I'll be counting on you to lead me
there.

21935.「ずいぶん 遠くまで来てしまったものですね。\n しかし ここならば 清廉の大滝:
We have come a long way, haven't we? But here,
we can receive the blessings of the Falls of
Purity without issue.

21936.「それでは <pc>さん。\n ゼキルの聖杭を 渡していただけますか？<yesn:
Okay then <pc>. Could you please give
me Zekir's Holy Stake?<yesno><close>

21937.「あらあら まるで 駄々っ子ね。\n とっても かわいらしいけど\n 聖杭を 渡:
Oh my goodness, what a spoiled brat. You're so
adorable, but I'm afraid I'm going to have to
ask you to hand over the sacred stake.

21938.<pc>は マザー・ヘレナに\nゼキルの聖杭を 渡した！:
<pc> gave Mother Helena the Zekir's
Holy Stake!

21939.「……確かに 受け取りましたわ。\n では さっそく ゼキルの聖杭に\n 祈りを:
I certainly received it. Now let's get started
praying to Zekir's Holy Stake.

21940.「……父なる 神よ。\n どうか 我が祈り 聞き届けたまえ……。\n そのチカラ:
God the Father. Please hear my prayer and
grant me the strength to carry it out.

21941.「……祈りは 届いたようですね。\n ゼキルの聖杭に チカラが たくわえられるま:
It seems your prayers were answered. It will
take a little more time for the power to be
tapped into Zekir's Holy Stake.

21942.「ただ待っていても 退屈ですから\n ドゥラの 昔話でもしましょうか……。:
Well, since I'm bored just waiting for you to
come back, I'll tell you an old story about
Dura...

21943.「……ドゥラは 確かに 賢い子でしたが\n それ以上に 心の優しい子でした。:
...Dura was a smart girl, to be sure, but more
than that, she had a kind heart.

21944.「おなかを空かせて 泣いている子がいたら\n ただでさえ少ない 自分のパンを\n:
If there is a child who is hungry and crying,
I share my Bread with him...

21945.「私は そんな優しいドゥラが 大好きでした。: I loved that kind, gentle Dura.

21946.「修道院のみんなは 野心家に変わってしまった\n あの子を 責めているけれど……:
Everyone at the monastery blames the ambitious
boy who has turned into...

21947.「あの子の心根は 今も 変わっていない……。\n 私は そう思うのです。:
I believe that her spirit is still the same
today.

21948.「……そういえば\n あの子とも こうやって並んで\n 川のせせらぎを 聞いてい:
I remember once I was listening to the
murmuring of the river side by side with her
like this.

21949.「懐かしいわ。\n もう 何年前のことに なるのかしら……。:
It's been so long. I wonder how many years
it's been already...

21950.「……ごめんなさいね。\n ちょっと 話し込んでしまったわ。\n 私 ゼキルの聖:
I'm sorry. We got a little carried away. I'm
going to go check on Zekir's Holy Stake.

21951.「……問題ありませんわ。\n 無事 聖杭に チカラが たくわえられました。\n:
No problem. The sacred stake has been tapped
for power. All that's left is for me to apply
my magic to finish it off.

21952.「というわけですので 仕上げが 終わるまで\n ゼキルの聖杭は 私が おあずかり:
So I will take care of Zekir's Holy Stake
until the finishing touches are put on it.
Please tell Dura that.

21953.「それでは 私は 修道院に戻ります。\n 帰りは 私ひとりでも 大丈夫ですので\:
I will return to the monastery. I will be fine
on my own on my way back to Dolworm, so please
don't worry about me.
